name: Escha & Logy Plus - Complete Costume Set
name_original: Escha & Logy Plus - Complete Costume Set
description:
This is the complete DLC set of Atelier Escha & Logy Plus ~Alchemists of the Dusk Sky~

This set includes below additional costumes,
- Nio 'the Administrator'
- 'Happy Wedding' & 'White Knight'
- 'Last Resort'
- 'Stripe Swimsuit'

1 player(s)
2048KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
